name: Curse of the Shadow Samurai
description:
In a village once peaceful, darkness descends when the malevolent Dark Spirit Clan arrives. They took everything from you; it is time for revenge.Curse of the Shadow Samurai is a hack and slash game where you engage waves of increasingly more powerful adversaries as you progress through multiple stages and defeat powerful bosses. Multiple upgrades will be available for you to choose from, transforming you into a more powerful warrior as you complete your vengeance.Features:

  • Fast paced combat

    Dash around the field as you quickly slash and take down your enemies.

  • Multiple stages

    Progress through the game by completing stages, unlocking new enemies and unique maps.

  • Unique bosses

    Each stage features a unique boss that will test your combat skills.

  • Perks

    As you progress through a stage, multiple perks will be available for you to choose from, giving you an advantage in combat by increasing your stats, adding new damage sources, summoning allies, or giving useful utility items. Choose carefully, as you won't be able to get them all.

  • Endless mode

    The ultimate challenge, battle through endless waves of enemies and bosses of increasing difficulty. How long will you survive?

Use your shadow abilities to strike down your enemies

Be ready to fight multiple types of enemies

Obtain powerful upgrades as you progress through enemy waves
